objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Science Fiction lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to education and learning in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about education and learning using informal register
Students create original scifi themed content about education and learning in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using informal register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in informal register within scifi theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
